attributes.additional_details:
I firmly believe in the death penalty(chemical) with out a firm detterent then crime & murders will increase.This must be curtailed!
Murderers,at present, only face a 16 yr sentence, then are let out with new ID,s and are protected by the police! What a waste of money.When proven guilty by the justice system these people should accept that they too loose their lives.
Lets have a proper deterrent. This is what human beings believe in. You do wrong then accept the punishment.
